SELECT u.id, u.profile_image AS profile,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_shelf bs WHERE bs.user_id = u.id AND bs.shelf_type = 3) AS bookshelves,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_review br WHERE br.user_id = u.id) AS reviews,
( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_shelf bs WHERE bs.user_id = u.id AND bs.shelf_type = 3) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_review br WHERE br.user_id = u.id) ) AS activityScore
FROM user u ORDER BY activityScore DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT u.id, u.profile_image AS profile,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll1 WHERE ll1.target_id = bc.id AND ll1.like_type = 3) AS collections,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll2 WHERE ll2.target_id = br.id AND ll2.like_type = 1) AS likes,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_list fl WHERE fl.follow_user_id = u.id) AS followers,
( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll1 WHERE ll1.target_id = bc.id AND ll1.like_type = 3) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll2 WHERE ll2.target_id = br.id AND ll2.like_type = 1) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_list fl WHERE fl.follow_user_id = u.id) ) AS activityScore
FROM user u LEFT JOIN book_collection bc ON bc.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN book_review br ON br.user_id = u.id
GROUP BY u.id, u.profile_image, bc.id, br.id ORDER BY activityScore DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT u.id, u.bio, u.profile_image AS profile,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_review br WHERE br.user_id = u.id AND br.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AS reviews,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_collection bc WHERE bc.user_id = u.id AND bc.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AS collections,
( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll1 WHERE ll1.target_id IN ( SELECT id FROM book_collection WHERE user_id = u.id AND creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND ll1.like_type = 3 AND ll1.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll2 WHERE ll2.target_id IN ( SELECT id FROM book_review WHERE user_id = u.id AND creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND ll2.like_type = 1 AND ll2.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) ) AS likes,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_list fl WHERE fl.follow_user_id = u.id) AS followers,
( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_collection bc WHERE bc.user_id = u.id AND bc.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) +
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_review br WHERE br.user_id = u.id AND br.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) +
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll1 WHERE ll1.target_id IN ( SELECT id FROM book_collection WHERE user_id = u.id AND creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND ll1.like_type = 3 AND ll1.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) +
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_list ll2 WHERE ll2.target_id IN ( SELECT id FROM book_review WHERE user_id = u.id AND creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND ll2.like_type = 1 AND ll2.creation_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) ) AS activityScore
FROM user u GROUP BY u.id, u.bio, u.profile_image ORDER BY activityScore DESC LIMIT #{itemsPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT b.id, b.book_api_id, b.thumbnail FROM book_shelf bs JOIN book b ON bs.book_id = b.id WHERE bs.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY bs.creation_date DESC LIMIT 3
